parameters: the game is organized in the simbolic level and the mechanic level
-the simbolic works with threads and events
-the mechanic level is made of actions and actors
-every action is framed by the thread, and it may trigger an event
-events are thread dependant, they can lead to the start of new threads

simplifying the AI to be a simple time progression
the code will just check for how many ingame days have passed
and just run certain codes for each part of the story
actions will happend through random situations, there will be
events on the map that will appear on certain conditions
when the player interacts with them they'll activate a random
situation which will depend on conditions and change the variables
on day 1 a fallen star is seen in dailight and after that paranormal waves attack the equipment
on day 2 paranormal waves attack again and the electric dam stops sending energy, so guts has to go fix it
on day 3 son2 didn't come back yesterday so they go out to look for him
on day 4 they find son1 possesed by the TV, the paranormal waves start again
on day 5 the star returns and the become weaker, but zombies appear! gathering on the beach, they're innactive without the waves, if the waves return they will attack
if the son is captured the zombies move to the escape port
on day 6 they all gather to decide what to do? do they attack? do they defend? do they send for help? do they run?
son2 wants to defend, daugther wants to attack, guts is worried and warns against bloodlust
on day 12 the star goes away and the waves return, now the zombies attack the gas station, there's an event during the day and another one at night.
